subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: As the Red Sox prepared for Game 7 of the A.L.C.S., David Ortiz and Jason Varitek were Boston’s only position players who also appeared in the 2004 World Series.
snippet: As the Red Sox prepared for Game 7 of the A.L.C.S., David Ortiz and Jason Varitek were Boston’s only position players who also appeared in the 2004 World Series.
